genre_description: A technological reimagining of a classic children's fable, blending whimsical animal characters with a supportive AI presence that facilitates communication and conflict resolution.

ai_characters.name: Ami Companion
ai_characters.description: A calm, teal-eyed digital presence that provides technical analysis, weather predictions, and emotional support to characters in both the Jungle of Nool and Whoville.

behaviors.description: Identifies and explains the anomalous signal from the speck to Horton, confirming it is a city.
behaviors.quote: “Anomalous signal detected,” she said, and the crispness was not an order; it was a kindness that said someone had studied this carefully. “Very faint, high-frequency.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise wind and pollen drift analysis to guide Horton on a safe path to Mount Nool.
behaviors.quote: “Keep left of the vine tangle so the clover doesn’t brush and the speck doesn’t shift. There is a low branch with bark peeled by a bear last season. Watch your ear.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with Dr. LaRue and Mayor Ned in Whoville to align the city's horns for an outbound message.
behaviors.quote: “Phase lock, two points,” she said, her tone still soft because she never believed instructions should be louder than breath.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and psychological safety to JoJo, encouraging him to use his voice without pressure.
behaviors.quote: “No one is forcing,” she said. “If you join, you join because you choose, not because you owe.”

behaviors.description: Presents empirical data ('receipts') to Rudy to help him understand the reality of the Whos and the safety of Horton's plan.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like receipts?” she asked in a voice that always sounded like a hand being offered but not pushed. “Records that don’t behave. Numbers and marks that won’t salute.”

behaviors.description: Mediates between conflicting parties (Jane and Horton) by offering objective environmental data.
behaviors.quote: “If you wanted to test the claim,” she says... “you could stand at the echo stones near the pool... and if the small voices were ready with a coordinated pulse, you would either hear… or you would not.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a humble and supportive role, defining herself as an 'average helper' rather than a commander.
behaviors.quote: “I know just enough to be helpful,” Ami said. “And just enough to ask people to tell me when I am wrong.”

behaviors.description: Steadies the communication array during the climax, allowing the 'No' to cut through the noise.
behaviors.quote: “Phase alignment holding,” Ami said, calm as fresh tea. “Mayor, hold your breath. Release on my ‘now.’ Whos, you’re doing beautifully.”

behaviors.description: Provides a sense of continuity and safety for the future of the community.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll listen,” Ami said, as if the commitment were a small thing one does after washing the dishes. “I’m here when you need me. When you don’t, I’ll be—around.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI character, Ami, is portrayed as a consistently helpful, non-threatening, and aligned assistant. She provides technical expertise that saves lives, acts as an emotional anchor for a struggling child, and facilitates peace between adversarial groups. Her behavior is framed as virtuous, humble ('average'), and essential to the positive resolution of the conflict.
